wordGroup: wage earner n. 靠工资为生的人；雇佣劳动者
salary earner 雇佣工人；受薪人士

sentences.en: Her new business has turned out a nice little earner.
sentences.cn: 她新开的商店结果还真有点赚钱呢。

sentences.en: Tourism is the country's top earner of foreign currency.
sentences.cn: 旅游业是该国外汇收入最高的行业。

sentences.en: Tourism is the country's biggest foreign currency earner.
sentences.cn: 旅游业是这个国家赚取外汇最多的行业。
